member.name: T:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.IChromaticAdaptation
member.summary: A linear transformation of a source color into a destination color by a linear transformation , which is dependent on the source reference white and the destination reference white .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.IChromaticAdaptation.Transform(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ,Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ,Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ)
member.remarks: Doesn't crop the resulting color space coordinates (e. g. allows negative values for XYZ coordinates).

member.name: T:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix
member.summary: Matrix used for transformation from XYZ to LMS, defining the cone response domain. Used in
member.remarks: Matrix data obtained from: Two New von Kries Based Chromatic Adaptation Transforms Found by Numerical Optimization S. Bianco, R. Schettini DISCo, Department of Informatics, Systems and Communication, University of Milan-Bicocca, viale Sarca 336, 20126 Milan, Italy http://www.ivl.disco.unimib.it/papers2003/CRA-CAT.pdf

member.name: F:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix.Bradford
member.summary: Bradford chromatic adaptation transform matrix (used in CMCCAT97)

member.name: F:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix.BradfordSharp
member.summary: Spectral sharpening and the Bradford transform

member.name: F:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix.CMCCAT2000
member.summary: CMCCAT2000 (fitted from all available color data sets)

member.name: F:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix.VonKriesHPE
member.summary: Von Kries chromatic adaptation transform matrix (Hunt-Pointer-Estevez for equal energy)

member.name: F:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix.VonKriesHPEAdjusted
member.summary: Von Kries chromatic adaptation transform matrix (Hunt-Pointer-Estevez adjusted for D65)

member.name: F:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.LMSTransformationMatrix.XYZScaling
member.summary: XYZ scaling chromatic adaptation transform matrix

member.name: T:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.VonKriesChromaticAdaptation
member.summary: Basic implementation of the von Kries chromatic adaptation model

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.VonKriesChromaticAdaptation.#ctor(Imagin.Common.Matrix)
member.summary: Transformation matrix used for the conversion (definition of the cone response domain).

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Adaptation.VonKriesChromaticAdaptation.Transform(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ,Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ,Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ)
member.summary: Transforms XYZ color to destination reference white.

member.name: T:Imagin.Colour.Compression.ICompanding
member.summary: Pair of companding functions for ; used for conversion to and back. See also, .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Compression.ICompanding.InverseCompanding(System.Double)
member.summary: Companded channel (nonlinear) is made linear with respect to energy.

member.name: P:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.ChromaticAdaptation
member.summary: Gets or sets the to perform; if , no is performed.

member.name: P:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.WhitePoint
member.summary: White point used for chromatic adaptation in conversions from/to XYZ color space. When null, no adaptation will be performed.

member.name: P:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.TargetLabWhitePoint
member.summary: White point used *when creating* Lab/LChab colors. (Lab/LChab colors on the input already contain the white point information) Defaults to: .

member.name: P:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.TargetLuvWhitePoint
member.summary: White point used *when creating* Luv/LChuv colors. (Luv/LChuv colors on the input already contain the white point information) Defaults to: .

member.name: P:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.TargetHunterLabWhitePoint
member.summary: White point used *when creating* HunterLab colors. (HunterLab colors on the input already contain the white point information) Defaults to: .

member.name: P:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.TargetWorkingSpace
member.summary: Working space used *when creating* RGB colors. (RGB colors on the input already contain the working space information) Defaults to: .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.Lab)
member.summary: Adapts Lab color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.LChab)
member.summary: Adapts LChab color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.LinearRGB)
member.summary: Adapts linear RGB color from the source working space to working space set in .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.Luv)
member.summary: Adapts Luv color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.HunterLab)
member.summary: Adapts Lab color from the source white point to white point set in .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.RGB)
member.summary: Adapts RGB color from the source working space to working space set in .

member.name: M:Imagin.Colour.Conversion.ColorConverter.Adapt(Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ,Imagin.Colour.Primitives.XYZ)
member.summary: Performs chromatic adaptation of given XYZ color. Target white point is .
